author: Sefy Levy
description: Classify carbonate rocks based on depositional texture and grain-to-mud ratios
reference: Dunham, R. J. (1962). Classification of carbonate rocks according to depositional texture.

classifications.name: MUDSTONE (<10% Grains)
classifications.description: Mud-supported carbonate rock containing less than 10% grains

classifications.name: WACKESTONE (>10% Grains)
classifications.description: Mud-supported carbonate rock containing more than 10% grains

classifications.name: PACKSTONE (Grain-supported with Mud)
classifications.description: Grain-supported carbonate rock containing intergranular mud

classifications.name: GRAINSTONE (No Mud)
classifications.description: Grain-supported carbonate rock lacking mud (typically <1% mud)

classifications.name: INSUFFICIENT TEXTURAL DATA
classifications.description: Missing mud/grain percentages or support type description
